entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts. He has a slight sneer and is mentioned as being brainy.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a student at Hogwarts. He interjects Snape with a question about where he's hoping to go.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is a student at Hogwarts. He roars with laughter and imitates Lily's voice.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is Harry's mother. She walks forward on trembling legs to be sorted into a house at Hogwarts.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts. She says 'Evans, Lily!' and drops the Sorting Hat onto her head.

relationships.description: Sirius interjects Snape with a question about where he's hoping to go.
James tries to trip Snape as he passes by.
Professor McGonagall sorts Lily into Gryffindor house using the Sorting Hat.
